channel.title: Thiago B. Procaci
channel.description: Recent content on Thiago B. Procaci

item.description: Skills Thiago is a data scientist and a senior software developer. His main skills are: Agile Software Development Social Network Analysis Applied Statistics Machine Learning International Publications How Do Outstanding Users Differ From Other Users in Q&A Communities? (2019) Trust Investigation in Communities Using Feature Learning (2019) Learning in Communities: How Do Outstanding Users Differ From Other Users? (2018) Experts and likely to be closed discussions in question and answer communities: An analytical overview (2018) Modelling Experts Behaviour in Q&A Communities to Predict Worthy Discussions.

item.title: Innovation and Invention
item.description: I have been working as a software developer for a long time and I usually listen to my coworkers’ opinions using arguments like “our company needs to innovate”. However, when you talk about innovation in a company, you will see people coming up with ideas such as technology adoption or the usage of a new cool methodology to create or improve something. Everybody agrees that it is good to create new things and some people feel proud of their creation.

item.title: Happy Birthday to BM
item.description: A scholarship A letter from my email says that I have got a scholarship.

item.title: Happy Birthday to BM
item.description: Happy Birthday to BM! Happy Birthday to you, Be happy and healthy!

item.title: I got my first salary
item.description: I got my first salary In this semester, I am a TA for C Language Programming. Today I got my first salary in my life. I felt proud of myself.
